mapper.select: select MatCode, MatName, MatParent from MP_MaterialInfor where compid = #{compid} and RecStatus = 1
select * from DD_StirInfoSet where compid = #{compid} order by StirId
mapper.update: update MP_StockIn set isPassOrNot=#{isPassOrNot}, PicturePath=#{picturePath}, MatCode=#{matCode}, StkCode=#{stkCode}, NotReason=#{notReason}, UpDownMark=0 where compid = #{compid} and StICode=#{stICode}
mapper.select: select MatCode,MatName,MatParent from MP_MaterialInfor where compid=#{compid} order by MatName
select StkCode,Sto_Name from MP_Stock where compid=#{compid} order by Sto_Name

select t1.stICode, t1.isPassOrNot, t1.PicturePath, t1.MatCode, t3.matName, t1.StkCode, t1.NotReason, t1.StkCode, t2.Sto_Name from MP_StockIn t1 left join MP_Stock t2 on t1.StkCode=t2.StkCode and t2.compid=#{compid} left join MP_MaterialInfor t3 on t1.MatCode=t3.MatCode and t3.compid=#{compid} where t1.compid=#{compid} and t1.stICode=#{stICode}
